idea:
Rohani Auto LLP is a Limited Liability Partnership entity founded to cater the demands of our Customers, by providing them fuel at their convenience, eliminating losses, maintaining paper-less billing approach and ensuring operational excellence.

1. PRODUCT: - We serve customers & ensure excellent quality of fuel delivered.

2. MARKET: - Target customers include Indian Railways, Aviation Industry, Mining Industry, Construction Sites, Fleet Operators etc. Total addressable market is over $ 75 Million. We are in pre-revenue stage but are gaining meaningful traction with customers. We project to capture at least five percent of this market in next 3 years.

3. COMPETITION: -Our competitors are Petrol Pumps, who serve as Conventional Suppliers of Fuel.
name: ROHANI AUTO LLP

idea:
We started CREDmitra with the vision of providing actionable analytics to FIs using an AI built using data collected through niche business process automation solutions and in the process lead the company to an IPO in the next 5 years.

Our MVP, targeting one of the niche business process automations, helps banks in automating the loan lifecycle management (application to disbursement & monitoring over lifecycle) @ <1% of loan amount.
name: CREDMITRA INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
